humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, one out of three sentinel lymph nodes is positive for micrometastasis (0.6 mm). Based on the new rule 12, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because one out of three sentinel lymph nodes is positive for micrometastasis (AJCC pN1mi(sn)), with the largest metastasis measuring 0.6 mm.
